title: MIRC font used for the first x-men movie credits
content:
I’m trying to locate the font which I was told was used for the first x-men movie. It is called MIRC, and was sold by a company called The Scarlet Letter. The company phone is disconnected, and I can’t find a reference to this font anywhere.

I would appreciate any help you may be able to provide in locating this font.

Thanks…
author: justlvs

comments.content: OPTI fonts do one - looks a bit Trecky if that's the one.
